import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './css/Admincss.css'; // Import the CSS file import { useAuthContext } from "../hooks/useAuthContext" //importing images import image1 from './images/image1.png' import image2 from './images/image2.png' import image3 from './images/image3.png' import image4 from './images/image4.png' import image5 from './images/image5.png' const UserPage = () =>{ const {user} = useAuthContext() const [userType, setUserType] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { const storedUser = localStorage.getItem('user'); if (storedUser) { const userObj = JSON.parse(storedUser); setUserType(userObj.userType); } }, []); // Empty dependency array ensures this effect runs only once on mount return( <>
{user.userType === 'user' && ( <>
)} {user.userType === 'admin' && ( <>
)}
) } export default UserPage
